targets.query: SELECT mean("total") FROM "$host.cpu" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT last("total") FROM "$host.processcount" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("min1") FROM "$host.load" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("min5") FROM "$host.load" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("min15") FROM "$host.load" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT /.\.total/ FROM "herrcrazi-X540YA.percpu" ORDER BY DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT mean("user") FROM "$host.cpu" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("system") FROM "$host.cpu" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("iowait") FROM "$host.cpu" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("used") FROM "$host.mem" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("total") FROM "$host.mem" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("$interface.rx")/mean("$interface.time_since_update")*8 FROM "$host.network" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("$interface.tx")/mean("$interface.time_since_update")*8*-1 FROM "$host.network" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("used") FROM "$host.memswap" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("total") FROM "$host.memswap" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("$disk.read_bytes") FROM "$host.diskio" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("$disk.write_bytes") FROM "$host.diskio" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("/.used") FROM "$host.fs" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(15s) fill(none)
SELECT mean("/.size") FROM "$host.fs" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT mean("/.percent") FROM "$host.fs" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT mean("/home.percent") FROM "$host.fs" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT mean("$container.cpu_percent") FROM "$host.docker" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT mean("$container.memory_usage") FROM "localhost.docker" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT mean("user") FROM "$host.cpu" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT min("user") FROM "localhost.cpu" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT max("user") FROM "localhost.cpu" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT mean("system") FROM "$host.cpu" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT min("system") FROM "$host.cpu" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT max("system") FROM "$host.cpu" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT mean("iowait") FROM "localhost.cpu" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT min("iowait") FROM "localhost.cpu" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT max("iowait") FROM "localhost.cpu" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT mean("ctx_switches") / mean("time_since_update") FROM "localhost.cpu" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT mean("interrupts") / mean("time_since_update") FROM "localhost.cpu" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT mean("Ambient.value") FROM "$host.sensors" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("CPU.value") FROM "$host.sensors" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

list.name: container
list.query: show field keys on glances from "$host.docker"

list.name: interface
list.query: show field keys on glances from "$host.network"

list.name: disk
list.query: show field keys on glances from "$host.diskio"
